```{cat, engine.opts = list(file = "color-text.lua")}
Span = function(el)
  color = el.attributes['color']
  -- if no color attribute, return unchange
  if color == nil then return el end
  
  -- transform to <span style="color: red;"></span>
  if FORMAT:match 'html' then
    -- remove color attributes
    el.attributes['color'] = nil
    -- use style attribute instead
    el.attributes['style'] = 'color: ' .. color .. ';'
    -- return full span element
    return el
  elseif FORMAT:match 'latex' then
    -- remove color attributes
    el.attributes['color'] = nil
    -- encapsulate in latex code
    table.insert(
      el.content, 1,
      pandoc.RawInline('latex', '\\textcolor{'..color..'}{')
    )
    table.insert(
      el.content,
      pandoc.RawInline('latex', '}')
    )
    -- returns only span content
    return el.content
  else
    -- for other format return unchanged
    return el
  end
end
```
## Data Types

### 種類

- Text Type     :	str

- Numeric Types :	int, float, complex

- Sequence Types:	list, tuple, range

- Mapping Type  :	dict

- Set Types     :	set, frozenset

- Boolean Type  :	bool

- Binary Types  :	bytes, bytearray, memoryview

- None Type     :	NoneType

### 如何判別型別

```{python}
x = 5
print(type(x))
```

### python並不是嚴格型別，不需要每次都宣告

```{python}
x = 5
y = "John"
print(x)
print(y)
```

甚至，你還可以自動變形

```{python}
x = 4       # x is of type int
x = "Sally" # x is now of type str
print(x)
```

當然，你也可以指定變數的型別

```{python}
x = str(3)    # x will be '3'
y = int(3)    # y will be 3
z = float(3)  # z will be 3.0
```

## 變數的規則

-   必須由字母開頭或底線

-   不能以數字開頭

-   變數的名稱只能含有字母、數字、底線

-   不能含有[python keyword](https://www.w3schools.com/python/python_ref_keywords.asp)

## 指定數個變數

1.指定數個變數

```{python}
x, y, z = "Orange", "Banana", "Cherry"
print(x)
print(y)
print(z)
```

2.多個數指定一個變數

```{python}
x = y = z = "Orange"
print(x)
print(y)
print(z)
```

3.指定一個集合

```{python}
fruits = ["apple", "banana", "cherry"]
x, y, z = fruits
print(x)
print(y)
print(z)
```

## Print

1.  最基本的print

```{python}
x = "Python is awesome"
print(x)
```

2.  你可以一次印好幾個變數，但記得用逗號格開，或是用＋號

```{python}
x = "Python"
y = "is"
z = "awesome"
print(x, y, z)
print(x + y + z)#這個方法不會將他們彼此隔開
```

必須注意的是，如果你想要一次print兩種變數時，請用,而不是用+號

## Global variable

如果你在一個function之外指定一個變數，他們就叫做global variable，意思是你的所有環境皆通用

```{python}
x = "awesome"

def myfunc(): #定義myfunc()
  x = "fantastic"
  print("Python is " + x)

myfunc()

#他不是function之內，所以用的是global variable
print("Python is " + x)

```

你也可以在fun()裡面指定global variable

```{python}
def myfunc():
  global x
  x = "fantastic"
  print("Python is " + x)

myfunc()
print("Python is " + x)
```
